name: chhoto-url
description: Chhoto URL is a lightweight and minimal URL shortener designed to be self-hosted. It includes link analytics, QR code support, and a simple dashboard to manage and track short URLs.
features: URL Shortening: Create short, memorable links easily. Clean URLs.
Link Analytics: Track clicks and visitor statistics. Understand traffic.
QR Codes: Generate QR codes for shortened links. Mobile-friendly.
Simple Dashboard: Manage all short URLs from one place. Easy organization.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage for efficient operation. Fast performance.
Self-Hosted: Keep your link data completely private. Complete control.
Custom Domains: Use your own domain for short links. Professional branding.
